homePageText.title: Azure API Management Service Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Use Azure API Management Service Diagnostics to investigate how your service is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:

categories.name: Availability and Performance
categories.description: Investigate issues with the API Management proxy responses, proxy policy errors and capacity. Find out the common causes and investigate in detail.
